short_summary: Overdose Prevention Site (OPS) construction project for Collins Bay Institution’s Medical Centre
description: Modify existing Medical Centre in building CBA14 to provide temporary safe injection space for offenders; interior renovations including new walls, flooring, windows, and electrical outlets; exterior changes to minimize exposure to viewers; construction completion within 6 weeks.
